title: Sins from my Stepmother: House of Lust
description: Teddy Carlson and his stepmom did a bad, bad thing… Jill has sworn Teddy to secrecy. It was a once off that can't happen again, especially now his father is home.So life at the Carlson household has settled back into its summer routine. David Carlson works late, Teddy works out and Jill works on tanning her gorgeous figure by the pool.But the flesh is weak and Teddy knows it, especially when he unwittingly discovers his stepmother’s Achilles’ heel.How long before Jill gives back into temptation? And to what lengths will they go to keep their sordid affair secret? 'House of Lust' is the second book in the 'Sins from my Stepmother' series. It has been widely acclaimed as quality taboo erotica.
author: C.R.R. Crawford
